name: IC-001 Extractor
description: This device is used to extract Exotics from Exotic Deposits. It requires the IC-001 Prototype Power Source to operate and can extract approximately 330 exotics per power source. The speed of the IC-001 Extractor is the same as the Electric Extractor . Due to a bug, the IC-001 Extractor will operate at the same speed as the Biofuel Extractor .
